numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I notice that many younger people are spread out in their opinions about how much the world is getting better.
2. There is no clear cluster of percentages among younger people.
3. I wonder why older people are much less optimistic than younger people.
4. Older people may be less optimistic because they perceive good things and bad things differently.
5. This situation could relate to my community.
6. Younger people in my community could try to make a difference.
7. Younger people in my community could try to move along with the world.
8. Older people in my community may stay behind.
9. Older people in my community may not support a changing world.
10. The headline is: Is this world-changing for good?
